mapper.insert: INSERT INTO payment(paymentnum, cardcompany,cardnum , cardvalid, cardcvc, paymentmoney, paymentpolicy, paymentdate, paymenttype, paymentpenalty, paymentstate) VALUES(#{paymentNum},#{cardCompany},#{cardNum},#{cardValid},#{cardCvc},#{paymentMoney},#{paymentPolicy},sysdate,1,#{paymentPenalty},1)
